TestCase.name: testSubQueryDeleteSql
TestCase.Resource:
== Abstract Syntax Tree == LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($0, $SCALAR_QUERY({ LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[MAX($0)]) LogicalProject(b=[$1]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[builtin, default, SmallTable, source: [ParquetVectorizedColumnRowTableSource -> selectedFields=[a, b, c, d];filterPredicates=[]]]]) }))]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[builtin, default, SmallTable, source: [ParquetVectorizedColumnRowTableSource -> selectedFields=[a, b, c, d];filterPredicates=[]]]])
== Optimized Logical Plan == Sink(name=[builtin,default,SmallTable], fields=[c, b]) +- Calc(select=[c, b]) +- NestedLoopJoin(where=[>(a, EXPR$0)], join=[a, b, c, EXPR$0], joinType=[InnerJoin], build=[right], singleRowJoin=[true]) :- TableSourceScan(table=[[builtin, default, SmallTable, source: [ParquetVectorizedColumnRowTableSource -> selectedFields=[a, b, c];filterPredicates=[]]]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[broadcast]) +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], select=[Final_MAX(max$0) AS EXPR$0]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- LocalHashAggregate(select=[Partial_MAX(b) AS max$0]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[builtin, default, SmallTable, source: [ParquetVectorizedColumnRowTableSource -> selectedFields=[b];filterPredicates=[]]]], fields=[b]) == Physical Execution Plan == : Data Source content : collect elements with CollectionInputFormat
: Data Source content : collect elements with CollectionInputFormat
: Operator content : LocalHashAggregate(select:(Partial_MAX(b) AS max$0),) ship_strategy : FORWARD
: Operator content : GlobalHashAggregate(select:(Final_MAX(max$0) AS EXPR$0),) ship_strategy : GLOBAL
: Operator content : NestedLoopJoin(where: (a > EXPR$0), buildRight) ship_strategy : FORWARD
: Operator content : Calc(select: (c, b)) ship_strategy : FORWARD
: Data Sink content : Sink: parquet sink: /tmp ship_strategy : FORWARD

TestCase.name: testDeleteSql
TestCase.Resource:
== Abstract Syntax Tree == LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($0, 10)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[builtin, default, SmallTable, source: [ParquetVectorizedColumnRowTableSource -> selectedFields=[a, b, c, d];filterPredicates=[]]]])
== Optimized Logical Plan == Sink(name=[builtin,default,SmallTable], fields=[c, b]) +- Calc(select=[c, b], where=[>(a, 10)]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[builtin, default, SmallTable, source: [ParquetVectorizedColumnRowTableSource -> selectedFields=[a, b, c];filterPredicates=[gt(a, 10)]]]], fields=[a, b, c]) == Physical Execution Plan == : Data Source content : collect elements with CollectionInputFormat
: Operator content : Calc(where: (a > 10), select: (c, b)) ship_strategy : FORWARD
: Data Sink content : Sink: parquet sink: /tmp ship_strategy : FORWARD
